item.title: cast interface struct golang
item.description: cast interface in golang can be usefull when you make a modular app using golang says package main import( "fmt" ) type Bird interface { Fly() } type Parrot struct { Bird Name string } func (p *Parrot) Fly() { fmt.Println("a Parrot name " + p.Name + " flying") } type Dove struct { Bird Name string } func (p *Dove) Fly() { fmt.Println("a Dove name " + p.Name + "
